Experience Data Insights Manager O2 Ireland March 2012  – Present (3 years 6 months) Dublin - Appointed as the primary data analyst in this newly created media organisation. 
- Managed team of analysts responsible for building campaigns and sending over 13m messages to Irish brands with very low subscriber opt-out rates of <0.5%. 
- Worked with large and complex datasets from across the organisation as well as integrating external third-party data to develop advertising products to deliver targeted direct marketing campaigns for O2 partners and clients.  
- Identified, extracted and manipulated data to build analytical models to give a deeper understanding of customers’ behaviours, profiles and interests.  
- Developed and prototyped clustering and segmentation models to create targeted behavioural segments (Sports, Homeowners, Motorists, Travellers, etc) which were utilised by many major brands in Ireland for direct SMS and location based marketing campaigns.  
- Predictive analytics techniques were used to create propensity models which maximised revenue and helped to achieve higher click through rates of up to 17%.
